page.description: Delete bytes from string at location.

argument.name: delete
argument.description: The number of characters to delete.

page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.Delete() method deletes bytes from string starting at the current offset.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is a text plus more text %text% ? txt = This is a text plus more text scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) scanner.delete(5) ? scanner.text = is a text plus more text
